description: This table contains the avoidable days comment. The primary key for the avoidable days comment table is Referral ID.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated coverage in this patient's referral record. Together with REFERRAL_ID, this forms the foreign key to the REFERRAL_CVG_BED table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple comments that are associated with the coverage and the referral from the REFERRAL_CVG_BED table.
